SEARCH
Module com.coolawesome.integrativeproject
Package com.coolawesome.integrativeproject

Class Planet

java.lang.Object
com.coolawesome.integrativeproject.Planet
public class Planet extends Object
Represents a planet in a simulated solar system, including properties such as position, velocity, and physical characteristics like radius and mass.

  • Constructor Details

    • Planet

      public Planet(String name, Vector3D position, Vector3D velocity, double radius, double mass, boolean isSun)
      Constructs a Planet object with specified properties, initializing with random color and spin rate.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the planet.
      position - The initial position of the planet as a Vector3D.
      velocity - The initial velocity of the planet as a Vector3D.
      radius - The radius of the planet.
      mass - The mass of the planet.
      isSun - A boolean indicating if the planet is the sun.

    • Planet

      public Planet(String name, Vector3D position, Vector3D velocity, double radius, double mass, boolean isSun, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Constructs a Planet object with specified properties and color, initializing with random spin rate.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the planet.
      position - The initial position of the planet as a Vector3D.
      velocity - The initial velocity of the planet as a Vector3D.
      radius - The radius of the planet.
      mass - The mass of the planet.
      isSun - A boolean indicating if the planet is the sun.
      color - The color of the planet.

    • Planet

      public Planet(String name, Vector3D position, Vector3D velocity, double radius, double mass, boolean isSun, javafx.scene.image.Image texture, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Constructs a custom Planet object with specified properties, texture, and color.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the planet.
      position - The initial position of the planet as a Vector3D.
      velocity - The initial velocity of the planet as a Vector3D.
      radius - The radius of the planet.
      mass - The mass of the planet.
      isSun - A boolean indicating if the planet is the sun.
      texture - The texture image of the planet.
      color - The color of the planet.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(double dt)
      Updates the planet's position and velocity based on its acceleration and the time step.
      Parameters:
      dt - The time step for the update.
